# appstoreconnect Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Copyright (c) HashiCorp, Inc.

provider "appstoreconnect" {
  issuer_id   = "4389f85c-98c6-4023-ab25-8154fcd9460d"
  key_id      = "A1234B5678"
  private_key = file("private_api_key.p8")
}
```
